raw_content: {"internal_thinking": "I am Player B and it's my turn to place the first settlement. I need to choose a node that offers a good combination of high-probability resource production and resource diversity. Player A has settled on Wood, Brick, and Sheep with rolls 11, 6, 8. I will look for a spot that complements these resources, ideally providing Wheat, and has strong dice rolls.Node 31 (Wh9, B10, W11) provides Wheat, Brick, and Wood with dice rolls of 9, 10, and 11. These are all high-probability rolls and offer a critical mix of resources for early game development, including Wheat which Player A currently lacks from their first settlement. This spot provides excellent resource diversity and strong production. Node 19 (W11, B10, S8) is also very strong with rolls 11, 10, 8, but provides Sheep which Player A already has. Taking Wheat from Node 31 provides better diversification for my starting resources.", "action": {"type": "place_starting_settlement", "parameters": "{\"node\": 31}"}}

parsed.internal_thinking: I am Player B and it's my turn to place the first settlement. I need to choose a node that offers a good combination of high-probability resource production and resource diversity. Player A has settled on Wood, Brick, and Sheep with rolls 11, 6, 8. I will look for a spot that complements these resources, ideally providing Wheat, and has strong dice rolls.Node 31 (Wh9, B10, W11) provides Wheat, Brick, and Wood with dice rolls of 9, 10, and 11. These are all high-probability rolls and offer a critical mix of resources for early game development, including Wheat which Player A currently lacks from their first settlement. This spot provides excellent resource diversity and strong production. Node 19 (W11, B10, S8) is also very strong with rolls 11, 10, 8, but provides Sheep which Player A already has. Taking Wheat from Node 31 provides better diversification for my starting resources. [Response was too brief]
